level.text: Documents in the complaint file shall be made available to the parties through a FOIA request after an administrative dismissal, withdrawal of the complaint, or after the issuance of an LOD.

If an LOD has been issued, only the parties can request the documents after a reconsideration. The complaint file is considered confidential and only the parties may request documents in the official complaint file.
Internal agency communications, mediation documents, investigator’s notes, supervisory memoranda of instructions, and recommendations shall not be made available to the parties.
The request for documents shall be made pursuant to FOIA.
